page.title: 09ADULT LEISURE
page.content: In the village of {Southill}there are many types of adult leisure,for example there are three pubs.The pubs are called{THE BLACK HORSE,THE WHITE {HORSE and THE WHITE SWAN.}In Southill there is an old disused railway station.There is also a Women's Institute.There is still a pub cricket team for the middle aged men.You could also walk around{Southill Park.}In Southill there are many lakes which you can fish in and hopefully catch a fish.Southill has an old school which holds meetings for the adults.The school also has a pool which you could cool down in after a long hot day. Instead you could go for a nice leisurely ride on your bike.
